title: Game Breakables
description: Do you need to break something? Game Breakables includes over 530+ designed game sound effects for all those moments where things need to break & shatter.
longDescription:
Listen To The Audio Demo!

Watch The Video Trailer


Inspired by games popular mobile games, the Game Breakables sound pack won’t let you down & covers an extensive range of realistic & highly processed sounds in the form of wood, metal, ice, rock, ceramics, magic as well as other popular destruction sound effects types.


Bash, Break, Shatter, Splatter!


Perfect for games & sound designers, this library of professional sound effects brings you an awesome set of crumbling, crinkling, crashing, rumble, breaks and creaking sounds, all aiming to bring richer sound design to your creations. From stock & standard game breakables like rock smash, pot break to creative sonic assets & found sounds discovered off the beaten path, Game Breakables will be sure to supply you with loads of inspiration. This sound pack easily fills any need for destruction-based sounds of any kind. With Game Breakables, we are sure you’ll be making smashing hit projects in no time.


UCS Compliant


All sound effects labeling is UCS compliant & is organized into categories to make it easier to navigate with understandable folder structures: such as Cartoon Pops, Ceramics, Cooking, Designed Cinematics, Electricity, Fire, Glass, Gore, Ice, Machine, Magic, Metal, Objects, Containers, Household Packaging, Coins, Paper, Plastic, Rocks, UI, Water and Wood. 


What’s Included:


Game Breakables includes over 530 sounds for your destructive sound needs. You’ll get sound effects for any type of game where breakable objects & elements are needed. Such as: Ice impacts, glass breaking, shards, debris, rock smashing, hits, ceramic pot smashing, wood chopping, shatters, crashes, electric crackles, flame bursts, magic swooshes, poofs, paper tearing, coin jingles, plastic crumbling, cartoon pops and gore squishes. 


Product details:


534 sound effects

445.1 MB of audio samples

Game Sound Effects Library

All in 44.1k 16bit .wav 

18 cartoon sound effects

27 glass breaks, shatters, impacts, & crashes

14 ceramic sound effects

41 wood breaks, crashes, friction, impacts

37 designed cinematic sound effects

9 electricity sound effects

11 fire sound effects

81 metal bashes, breaks, slams, impacts

21 cooking, eating, drinking styled sfx

20 gore sfx

14 ice

11 machine

42 magic

95 objects

10 paper

15 plastic

42 rock

15 UI

11 water

All sound effects are youtube friendly & royalty-free

Demo music & voice in trailer not included**

RTU-OTB (ready to use out of the box)
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 534

Number of Audio Cues: 534

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1k 16bit .wav

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 12

Supported Development Platforms:
